name: Eclipse for Android Developers
description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE. This is the installation package customized for Android developers. It includes Java IDE, Git, XML editor,Maven and Mylyn.

zh_CN.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为Android开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java集成开发环境、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven、Mylyn插件。
zh_CN.name: Eclipse for Android Developers
